description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

advisories.affected_versions: All versions before 5.5.2, all versions starting from 6.0.0 before 6.3.3, all versions starting from 7.0.0 before 7.0.1
advisories.description: The TYPO3 Extension femanager prior to versions 5.5.2, 6.3.3, and 7.0.1 is vulnerable to broken access control. The `usergroup.inList` validation can be bypassed resulting in new frontend users created by the extension may be members of groups that are restricted. The vulnerability is only exploitable if the field usergroup is available in the registration form. Versions 5.5.2, 6.3.3, and 7.0.1 contain patches.
advisories.not_impacted: All versions starting from 5.5.2 before 6.0.0, all versions starting from 6.3.3 before 7.0.0, all versions starting from 7.0.1
advisories.title: TYPO3 Extension femanager vulnerable to Broken Access Control
